body_html: Re-assigning this to @yuanbyu, who knows the current gradients code best, and would be able to estimate the changes needed. (I suspect that this would require a considerable amount of work to update the existing gradient functions, which may have latent assumptions about expecting tf.float32 or tf.float64 values.)

body: Re-assigning this to @yuanbyu, who knows the current gradients code best, and would be able to estimate the changes needed. (I suspect that this would require a considerable amount of work to update the existing gradient functions, which may have latent assumptions about expecting `tf.float32` or `tf.float64` values.)
